A smart microwave oven that can automatically detect the type of food being heated and adjust the cooking time and power level accordingly. This smart oven can also provide nutritional information and suggest healthier cooking options based on the user's dietary preferences.

A microwave oven with a built-in air fryer feature that allows users to cook healthier versions of their favorite fried foods with minimal oil. The air fryer feature uses hot air to cook food, resulting in a crispy exterior and a tender interior, similar to deep-frying, but with much less oil.

A compact, portable microwave oven that can be easily taken on the go. This microwave can be powered by a rechargeable battery, making it perfect for camping trips, picnics, or any other situation where access to a traditional outlet is limited.

A smart microwave oven with a built-in meal planning and grocery list feature. This feature would allow users to input their dietary preferences and receive personalized meal suggestions and grocery lists. The oven would also be able to automatically detect the ingredients in the user's pantry and suggest meals that can be made using those ingredients.

A microwave oven with a built-in herb garden. This oven would have a small compartment or tray that can be used to grow herbs such as basil, parsley, or cilantro. The herbs could be used to add fresh flavor to dishes cooked in the microwave, or they could be used as a garnish for meals. This feature would allow users to have fresh herbs on hand at all times, without the need for a separate herb garden or grocery store purchase.
